); const ReviewRow = (props) => { let scores = props.review.feedback.map(item => item.score); let totalScore = scores.reduce((total, score) => { console.log(total + score);return total + score; }, 0); let avgScore = '-'; if(props.review.feedback && props.review.feedback.length != 0) { avgScore = totalScore / props.review.feedback.length; } return (
{props.review.name}
{props.review.feedback.length} / {props.review.assigned.length} {avgScore.toFixed(2)} ) } ; export default Reviews;
